title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A simple and authentic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper. Ready in under 30 minutes!

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry packed with fresh vegetables. Customize with your favorite veggies and protein for a perfect weeknight meal.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: A timeless classic! These cookies are chewy in the center with slightly crispy edges, and loaded with chocolate chips.
